Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. You came at a good
time!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Michelle is putting on a magic show.
<PAGE>
Why don't you make yourself comfortable
and watch?

Michelle! Once again, your magic was
terrific.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks.<RED>∀</RED> I'm glad you liked
it!

Here's a little something from me to
show my appreciation for such a superb
magic show. Here, take it.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah! It's so beautiful! Thanks again,
<MYNAME>. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come to the next show too, OK?<RED>∀</RED>
I'll be waiting for you.
Of course! Whoa, look at the time.
Well, Michelle, see you next time.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>! You came to see my show!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
There was a big audience, so I think
I got a little overly enthusiastic.
Now all of sudden I'm thirsty...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? You'll treat me to a drink?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well I don't mind if I do. Thank you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... What should I get? There are so
many choices it's hard to decide.
<PAGE>
Oh, I know! <MYNAME>, why don't you
try to guess my favorite drink?
Strawberry tea
Carrot juice

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, that's amazing! This is my
favorite! How did you know?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tee-hee. <MYNAME>, you really are great!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, all done. <MYNAME>, our time
together is always so fun! But I've
got to get going soon.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's right! You can cook, right?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I really love <GREEN>chocolate pudding</GREEN>!<RED>∀</RED> I bet
your chocolate pudding would be
delicious, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, that's wonderful! Let's talk again
then.
<PAGE>
I'm really looking forward to your
cooking, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>.... Talk about bad luck. I don't
like that drink at all.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, that's right! I've got something I
have to go take care of.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, invite me again if you
like. I can't wait!
<PAGE>
If you also happened to have some
<GREEN>chocolate pudding</GREEN>, that would
really make my day! See you!
